text: Sharon Rachel Osbourne ( Arden; born 9 October 1952) is a British-American music manager, television personality, and talent show judge. Osbourne first became famous on The Osbournes which was a reality show that showed Osbourne and her family in their daily lives. Sharon was born at Westminster Hospital in London, She is youngest child of Don Arden and Hope Shaw, She have a one brother David. She has also been a judge on the talent shows The X Factor and America's Got Talent. Her autobiography, Extreme, which Osbourne wrote about her life, was very successful and has sold 2 million copies. She has recovered from colorectal cancer. She is married to the rock singer Ozzy Osbourne and she has three children with him named Kelly Osbourne, Jack Osbourne and Aimee Osbourne. ==References== ==Other websites== *Sharon Osbourne at itv.com/xfactor *Sharon Osbourne Website *Sharon Osbourne biography at mtv.com *The Osbournes at mtv.com * Category:British autobiographers Category:Television personalities from London Category:1952 births Category:Living people
title: Sharon Osbourne
